description.value: Whether it’s used as a public museum or a private collection, this often-understated room highlights the special few objects placed in it and has comfortable seating for reflection and contemplation. At a GM’s discretion, a display room can be used for the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.73lSOAnF2qMQLWoS.JournalEntryPage.2onk0uPJ23sQ8ea6]{lounge} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.73lSOAnF2qMQLWoS.JournalEntryPage.XvLKIkHgVAFE8ZIg]{research} downtime activities (Character Operations Manual 153–155).
